title: Research Scientist
summary: Howdy! and welcome to my research website. My research is focused on short-term climate variability and air-sea interactions in the vicinity of midlatitude western boundary currents. Please use the site navigation to find more information about me and my work.

roles.title: Graduate Research Assistant
roles.description: My research focuses on ocean-atmosphere interaction near western boundary currents in the midlatitude Northern Hemisphere to better understand climate variability

roles.title: Student Researcher – Collin’s Group
roles.description: Aided Dr. Don Collins’s research group in building a gas chamber to manipulate aerosols.

roles.title: Student Researcher
roles.description: Conducted research at the Texas A&M Soltis Center for Research and Education on the edge of the Monteverde Preserve in Costa Rica. My tasks included deploying four portable weather stations, collecting field data, and analyzing long-term temperature and precipitation data from online datasets.
